dct_title_s: The traveller's companion, or, The post roads of England and Wales : with the distances in measured miles
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Published ... as the Act directs, 12th. May 1794." In upper margin: Carte d'Angleterre avec les routes et distances marqué en milles anglois / par le Sr. J. Rocque.
dct_publisher_sm: London : Published by Laurie & Whittle, No. 53, Fleet-Street, 1794.
